Package algorithms.trees

Class Tree_BatchSorting

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.trees.TDP_Iterator
      • algorithms.trees.TDP_Anyk_Iterator
        • algorithms.trees.Tree_Batch
          • algorithms.trees.Tree_BatchSorting
  • public class Tree_BatchSorting
extends Tree_Batch
    This algorithm produces all the solutions to a T-DP problem specified as a TDP_Problem_Instance object and then sorts them so that it can return them in ranked order. The class has been customized for join problems only since it produces Tree_Query_Solution as results. It is implemented as an iterator that is first initialized and then the method Tree_Batch.get_next() returns the next best solution. The batch-computation of all the solutions is done via the methods of Tree_Batch that are inherited.

    IMPORTANT: Before using this class, the nodes and the edges of the DP state-space graph must have already been initialized either by DP_Problem_Instance.bottom_up() or some other method.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis
